TopicTitle: Looking for a larger lander can.

Articles.Content:
Not too long ago I saw a YouTube mod review handling a mod that, among other things, offered a size3 lander can. I've been searching and digging all over but can't remember the name or find the video again. At one point I thought to have identified the particular YouTuber but browsing his channel again resulted in failure.

Just like Taurus HCV offers a great size3 7 Kerbal capsule I am looking for a size3 stock-a-like lander can.
Any help is appreciated.

Edited February 16, 2017 by Tex_NL
That would be LithoBrake Exploration Technologies, but it was a 2.5m base size.

Thanks. That video indeed does look very familiar.
I could be mistaking but I remember the can being bigger. And adding another big pack to my already bloated modlist is a bit much for just a single seat more. Unless any other suggestions pop up I might have to strip everything from that mod except the can.
